blocks:
assign last_master_ns = rst
                            ? ONE[0+:WIDTH]
                            : upd_last_master
                                ? current_master
                                : last_master_r;

generate
    for (i = 0; i < WIDTH; i = i + 1) begin : channel
      wire [WIDTH-1:1] inh_group;
      for (j = 0; j < (WIDTH-1); j = j + 1) begin : last_master
          assign inh_group[j+1] =
                  dbl_last_master_ns[i+j] && |dbl_req[i+WIDTH-1:i+j+1];
      end
